title: Effetti Digitali Italiani
description: 'EDI VFX: Where Imagination Comes to Life' – A cutting-edge project for the renowned Italian VFX company, Effetti digitali italiani (EDI). I spearheaded the development of their dynamic website, blending advanced animations and a modern aesthetic to captivate audiences. Leveraging WordPress, I crafted custom plugins to effortlessly extract frames from videos, seamlessly transforming them into stunning project cover images. The result? An immersive experience on the uninterrupted search page and a state-of-the-art video player that elevates the user's journey.
